message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value, I believe a starting price of $14,000 is fair.  What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you coming down to $14,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $13,000 at this point.  What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $13,000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
